target.name: help
target.echo:
1. Specify 'version' properties in release.properties file. 2. Start this build script with target 'change'
Note: it does not change version in pom.xml files Please, rely on maven tool(s) to do that.
P.S. It fails on purpose after displaying this text. Thus, it guarantees that build process uses this script properly.
